name: Toonmania for Chrome

screenshots.caption: Menu includes favorites, settings, history, and downloads
Menu includes Browse all, most popular and latest uploaded sub categories for the dubbed anime, cartoons, and movies categories
Community category has a shoutbox for chatmania, and settings for chatmania, section to show their other apps, sharing function and FAQ section

short_description:
Toonmania for Chrome is a fully functional conversion of the android app by droid bender. Please be aware, I did not make the android app, but I converted it for use in chrome. For the longest time, I wanted an easy, free way to watch anime and cartoons. So, finally I found Toonmania. All you could ever want for Dubbed Anime, Cartoons, and Anime/Cartoon Movies. Literally, well over 1000+ hours of content. Thousands of shows Old and New. Hundreds of movies. 
ARCon Runtime chrome extension is required to run.
The process for installing this and this chrome app as  an unpacked extension(.zip file) is explained on this page (http://digiwonk.wonderhowto.com/how-to/run-android-apps-chrome-for-windows-mac-linux-0157523)
To install as a regular extension(.crx file) just download the .crx file and open in chrome.
Update: I have packaged the Archon custom runtime extension into a .crx file so it's easier to install. The way mentioned above is still valid, but now it can be installed normally
summary: A conversion of the android app by Droidbender
